Pet Medical

Aniwear

A Hong Kong-based start-up that is dedicated to providing a professional and affordable cardiac assessment service for every pet.

  • Date

    Stage

    Location

  • Late 2016

    Early

    Hong Kong

  • Segment

    Founder

    Website

  • AloT Platform, Hardware

    Joe Mak

    https://www.homecourt.ai/

It's the World's first AIoT platform for Veterinary Cardiology. ANIWEAR that is dedicated to providing a professional and affordable cardiac assessment service for every pet. To make this happen, the company has developed an a lot platform for Veterinary Cardiology – CardioBird with which veterinary professionals can provide cadiac examination to pets (animals) is a convenient, rapid and reliable manner with minimal resources requirement that is not possible before.
